entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:13 AM PST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog dissipating early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 08 January 2023
